title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.2 - Requirement for license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.2 - Requirement for license

State Regulations
(a) No person
shall act as a security officer, supervisory security officer or management
security officer within the Port of New York District without first having
obtained a license or temporary permit from the commission. No person shall
employ a security officer, supervisory security officer, or management security
officer who has not obtained such license or temporary permit. (b) Licensure under this Part shall not be
required by persons who are employed by any person who, pursuant to section
3.2
(b) of this

Title, has been granted a conditional stevedore license upon submission of an
annual certification of compliance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
